title: Living tomorrow. No. 114
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Hypothermia and old people keeping warm in the home to mountaineering; river pollution and the common midge family over 300 species; chemical food spraying and problems caused such as getting into water supplies; filling food containers all to the same levels.
